content.prompt: Unlike traditional war memorials, Auguste Rodin’s The Burghers of Calais represents a group portrait that

choices.label: depicts both famous and anonymous townspeople
shows soldiers’ physical wounds in explicit detail
focuses on a single, central heroic figure
includes men of equal height who have no clear leader

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
